articles.title: Austria locks down, Merkel says new steps needed as Europe faces COVID freeze - Reuters
articles.description: Austria became on Monday the first country in western Europe to reimpose lockdown since vaccines were rolled out, shutting non-essential shops, bars and cafes as surging caseloads raised the spectre of a second straight winter in deep freeze for the continent.
